0x935C0AB2.name: GET_CONVAR_INT

params.name: varName
params.description: The console variable to look up.

params.name: default_
params.description: The default value to set if none is found (variable not set using [SET_CONVAR](#\_0x341B16D2), or not accessible).

0x935C0AB2.description: Can be used to get a console variable casted back to `int` (an integer value).

examples.code:
if GetConvarInt('remainingRounds', 0) < 900 then
    Citizen.Trace("Less than 900 rounds remaining...")
end

0x935C0AB2.resultsDescription: Returns the convar value if it can be found, otherwise it returns the assigned `default`.
